Mini Herb Garden: Convert a picture frame into a mini herb garden by attaching small pots or planters to the frame and filling them with your favorite herbs. This can be a great addition to your kitchen or as a gift for a fellow gardening enthusiast.
Candle Holder: Use a picture frame as a unique candle holder by attaching a tea light or votive candle to the back of the frame and placing it on a table or mantle.
Customized Coasters: Attach small pieces of cork or felt to the back of a picture frame and use it as a coaster for your coffee table or desk.

Wall-Mounted Planter: Transform a picture frame into a planter by attaching a small pot or planter to the back of the frame and mounting it on your wall. This can be a great way to add some greenery to your home or office.

Artistic Display: Use a picture frame as a display for small artistic pieces, such as seashells, pebbles, or other small collectibles. You can attach the items to the frame using glue, wire, or other adhesives.
